arabicText: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
All	whatever	is	in	the	heavens	and	in	the	earth	proclaims	the	Purity	of	Allah;	and	He	only	is	the	
Most	Honourable,	the	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ki	pāki	bolta	hai	jo	kuch	āsmānoñ	aur	zameen	meiñ	hai	aur	Wohi	‘Izzat-o-Hikmat	wāla	
hai.

arabicText: لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
For	Him	only	is	the	kingship	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	He	gives	life	and	causes	death;	and	
He	is	Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Usi	ke	liye	hai	āsmānoñ	aur	zameen	ki	saltanat	jilāta	hai	aur	mārta	aur	Woh	sab	kuch	kar	sakta	
hai.

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلْأَوَّلُ وَٱلْـَٔاخِرُ وَٱلظَّـٰهِرُ وَٱلْبَاطِنُ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
He	only	is	the	First	and	He	only	the	Last,	and	He	only	is	the	Evident	and	He	only	the	Concealed;	
and	it	is	He	Who	knows	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText: Wohi	Awwal	Wohi	Ākhir	Wohi	Zāhir	Wohi	Bātin	Aur	Wohi	Sab	Kuch	Jānta	Hai.

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا ۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	created	the	heavens	and	the	
earth	in	six	days,	then	(befitting	His	
Majesty)	established	Himself	upon	the	
Throne	(of	Control);	He	knows	all	what	
goes	into	the	earth	and	all	what	comes	out	
of	it,	and	all	what	descends	from	the	sky	
and	all	that	rises	in	it;	and	He	is	with	you,	
wherever	you	may	be;	and	Allah	is	seeing	
your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	hai	jisne	āsmān	aur	zameen	chhe	
(6)	din	meiñ	paida	kiye	phir	‘arsh	par	
istiwa	farmāya	jaisa	ke	uski	shān	ke	lāiq	
hai	jānta	hai	jo	zameen	ke	andar	jāta	hai	
aur	jo	us	se	bāhar	nikalta	hai	aur	jo	
āasmān	se	utarta	hai	aur	jo	us	meiñ	
chadhta	hai	aur	woh	tumhāre	sāth	hai	
tum	kahiñ	ho	aur	Allah	tumhāre	kām	
dekh	raha	hai

arabicText: لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
englishTranslationText:
For	Him	only	is	the	kingship	of	the	
heavens	and	the	earth;	and	towards	Allah	
only	is	the	return	of	all	matters.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Usi	ki	hai	āsmānoñ	aur	zameen	ki	saltanat	
aur	Allah	hi	ki	taraf	sab	kāmoñ	ki	ruju’.

arabicText: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيْلَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Rāt	ko	din	ke	hisse	meiñ	lāta	hai	aur	din	
ko	rāt	ke	hisse	meiñ	lāta	hai	aur	woh	
diloñ		ki	bāt	jānta	hai

arabicText: ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَأَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسْتَخْلَفِينَ فِيهِ ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَأَنفَقُوا۟ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌۭ كَبِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Accept	faith	in	Allah	and	His	Noble	
Messenger,	and	spend	in	His	cause	from	
what	He	has	made	you	the	heirs	of;	so	for	
those	among	you	who	accepted	faith	and	
spent	in	His	cause,	is	a	great	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	par	imān	lāo	aur	
uski	rāh	(meiñ)	kuch	woh	kharch	karo	jis	
meiñ	tumheiñ	auroñ	ka	ja-nasheen	kiya	to	
jo	tum	meiñ	Imān	lāye	aur	uski	rāh	meiñ	
kharch	kiya	unke	liye	bada	sawāb	hai	.

arabicText: وَمَا لَكُمْ لَا تُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ ۙ وَٱلرَّسُولُ يَدْعُوكُمْ لِتُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِرَبِّكُمْ وَقَدْ أَخَذَ مِيثَـٰقَكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	what	is	the	matter	with	you,	that	you	
should	not	accept	faith	in	Allah?	Whereas	
this	Noble	Messenger	is	calling	you	to	
believe	in	your	Lord,	and	Allah	has	indeed	
already	taken	a	covenant	from	you,	if	you	
believe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tumheiñ		kya	hai	ke	Allah	par	imān	na	
lāo	halāñke	yeh	Rasool	tumheiñ		bula	rahe	
haiñ	ke	apne	Rab	par	imān	lāo	aur	be
shak	woh	tum	se	pehle	hi	‘ahed	le	chuka	
hai	agar	tumheiñ		yaqeen	ho.

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦٓ ءَايَـٰتٍۭ بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ لِّيُخْرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُمْ لَرَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	sends	down	clear	verses	
upon	His	chosen	bondman,	in	order	to	
take	you	out	from	the	realms	of	darkness	
towards	light;	and	indeed	Allah	is	Most	
Compassionate,	Most	Merciful	upon	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	hai	ke	apne	bande	par	raushan	
Āyateiñ	utārta	hai	ke	tumheiñ		
andheriyoñ	se	ujāle	ki	taraf	le	jāye	aur	be
shak	Allah	tum	par	zaroor	maherbān	
rahem	wāla.

arabicText: وَمَا لَكُمْ أَلَّا تُنفِقُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَٰثُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا يَسْتَوِى مِنكُم مَّنْ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبْلِ ٱلْفَتْحِ وَقَـٰتَلَ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَعْظَمُ دَرَجَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنفَقُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدُ وَقَـٰتَلُوا۟ ۚ وَكُلًّۭا وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	what	is	the	matter	with	you	that	you	should	not	spend	in	Allah’s	cause,	whereas	Allah	is	the	
Inheritor	of	all	that	is	in	the	heavens	and	in	the	earth?	Those	among	you	who	spent	and	fought	
before	the	conquest	of	Mecca	are	not	equal	to	others;	they	are	greater	in	rank	than	those	who	
spent	and	fought	after	the	conquest;	and	Allah	has	promised	Paradise	to	all	of	them;	and	Allah	
well	knows	what	you	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tumheiñ		kya	hai	ke	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	
kharch	na	karo	halāñke	āsmānoñ	aur	
zameen	sab	ka	wāris	Allah	hi	hai,	tum	[meiñ]	barābar	nahi	woh	jinhoñ	ne	Fatah-e-Makkah	se	
qabl	kharch	aur	Jihād	kiya	woh	martabe	meiñ	un	se	bade	haiñ	jinhoñ	ne	b’ad	Fatah	ke	kharch	
aur	Jihād	kiya	aur	un	sab	se	Allah	Jannat	ka	w’ada	farma	chuka	aur	Allah	ko	tumhāre	kāmoñ	ki	
khabar	hai.

arabicText: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِى يُقْرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا فَيُضَـٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥ وَلَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Who	will	lend	a	handsome	loan	to	Allah	so	that	He	may	double	it	for	him?	And	for	such	is	an	
honourable	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kaun	hai	jo	Allah	ko	qarz	de	achcha	qarz	to	woh	uske	liye	doone	kare	aur	usko	ízzat	ka	sawāb	
hai.

arabicText: يَوْمَ تَرَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ يَسْعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَـٰنِهِم بُشْرَىٰكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ جَنَّـٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
The	day	when	you	will	see	the	believing	
men	and	believing	women,	that	their	light	
runs	before	them	and	on	their	right	-	it	
being	said	to	them,	“This	day,	the	best	
tidings	for	you	are	the	Gardens	beneath	
which	rivers	flow	-	abide	in	it	forever;	this	
is	the	greatest	success.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	din	tum	Imān	wāle	mardoñ	aur	imān	
wāli	aurtoñ	ko	dekhoge	ke	unka	noor	unke	
āage	aur	unke	dehne	daudta	hai	un	se	
farmāya	ja	raha	hai	ke	āaj	tumhāri	sab	se	
ziyada	khushi	ki	bāt	woh	Jannateiñ	haiñ	
jinke	neeche	nehreiñ	baheiñ	tum	un	meiñ	
hamesha	raho	yehi	badi	kāmyābi	hai.

arabicText: يَوْمَ يَقُولُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتُ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱنظُرُونَا نَقْتَبِسْ مِن نُّورِكُمْ قِيلَ ٱرْجِعُوا۟ وَرَآءَكُمْ فَٱلْتَمِسُوا۟ نُورًۭا فَضُرِبَ بَيْنَهُم بِسُورٍۢ لَّهُۥ بَابٌۢ بَاطِنُهُۥ فِيهِ ٱلرَّحْمَةُ وَظَـٰهِرُهُۥ مِن قِبَلِهِ ٱلْعَذَابُ
englishTranslationText:
The	day	when	hypocrite	men	and	hypocrite	
women	will	say	to	the	Muslims,	“Look	
mercifully	towards	us,	so	that	we	may	gain	
some	of	your	light!”;	it	will	be	said	to	them,	
“Turn	back,	search	light	over	there!”;	so	
they	will	turn	around,	whereupon	a	wall	
will	be	erected	between	them,	in	which	is	a	
gate;	inside	the	gate	is	mercy,	and	on	the	
outer	side	is	the	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	din	munafiq	mard	aur	munafiq	aurteiñ	
Musalmanoñ	se	kaheñ	ge	ke	hameiñ	ek	
nigah	dekho	ke	hum	tumhāre	noor	se	kuch	
hissa	leiñ	kahā	jāyega	apne	peechhe	lauto	
wahāñ	Noor	dhooñdo	woh	lauteñ	ge	jabhi	
unke	darmiyan	ek	deewār	khadi	kardi	jāye	
gi	jis	meiñ	ek	darwāza	hai	uske	andar	ki	
taraf	raḥmat	aur	uske	bāhar	ki	taraf	áƶāb.

arabicText: يُنَادُونَهُمْ أَلَمْ نَكُن مَّعَكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنَّكُمْ فَتَنتُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَتَرَبَّصْتُمْ وَٱرْتَبْتُمْ وَغَرَّتْكُمُ ٱلْأَمَانِىُّ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْغَرُورُ
englishTranslationText:
The	hypocrites	will	call	out	to	the	Muslims,	
“Were	we	not	with	you?”;	they	will	answer,	
“Yes	you	were,	why	not?	But	you	had	put	
your	souls	into	trial,	and	you	used	to	await	
misfortune	for	the	Muslims,	and	you	
doubted,	and	false	hopes	deceived	you	until	
Allah’s	command	came	-	and	the	big	cheat	
had	made	you	conceited	towards	the	
command	of	Allah.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Munafiq	Musalmanoñ	ko	pukāreñ	ge	kya	
hum	tumhāre	sāth	na	they	woh	kaheñ	ge	
kyuñ	nahi	magar	tum	ne	to	apni	jāneiñ	fitne	
meiñ	daleiñ	aur	Musalmanoñ	ki	burāyi	
takte	aur	shak	rakhte	aur	jhooti	tama'	ne	
tumheiñ		fareb	diya	yahāñ		tak	ke	Allah	ka	
ḥukm	āa	gaya	aur	tumheiñ	Allah	ke	ḥukm		
par	us	bade	farebi	ne	maghroor	rakha

arabicText: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا يُؤْخَذُ مِنكُمْ فِدْيَةٌۭ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ مَأْوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ ۖ هِىَ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
“So	this	day	no	ransom	is	to	be	taken	from	
you	nor	from	the	declared	disbelievers;	
your	destination	is	the	fire;	that	is	your	
companion;	and	what	a	wretched	
outcome!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	āaj	na	tum	se	koi	fidya	liya	jāye	aur	na	
khule	kāfiroñ	se	tumhāra	thikāna	āg	hai,	
woh	tumhāri	rafeeq	hai,	aur	kya	hi	bura	
anjām.

arabicText: ۞ أَلَمْ يَأْنِ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَن تَخْشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمْ لِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِن قَبْلُ فَطَالَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْأَمَدُ فَقَسَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Has	not	the	time	come	for	the	believers	to	
surrender	their	hearts	to	Allah’s	
remembrance	and	to	this	truth	that	has	
come	down?	And	do	not	be	like	those	who	were	earlier	given	the	Book(s)	and	when	a	long	term	
passed	over	them,	their	hearts	became	hardened;	and	many	of	them	are	sinners.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	Imān	waloñ		ko	abhi	woh	waqt	na	āaya	
ke	unke	dil	jhuk	jāyeñ	Allah	ki	yād	aur	us	
haq	ke	liye	jo	utra	aur	un	jaise	na	hoñ	jinko	
pehle	kitāb	di	gayi	phir	un	par	muddat	
darāz	huyi	to	unke	dil	sakht	ho	gaye	aur	un	
meiñ	bahut	fāsiq	haiñ

arabicText: أَلَمْ يَأْنِ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَن تَخْشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمْ لِذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِن قَبْلُ فَطَالَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْأَمَدُ فَقَسَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Know	that	it	is	Allah	Who	revives	the	earth	after	its	death;	We	have	indeed	illustrated	the	signs	
for	you,	for	you	to	understand.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jān	lo	ke	Allah	zameen	ko	zinda	karta	hai	isko	mare	peeche	be-shak	hum	ne	tumhāre	liye	
nishāniyāñ	bayān	farma	deiñ	ke	tumheiñ	samajh	ho

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلْمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَٱلْمُصَّدِّقَـٰتِ وَأَقْرَضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا يُضَـٰعَفُ لَهُمْ وَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	the	charity-giving	men	and	women,	and	those	who	lend	an	excellent	loan	to	Allah	–	for	
them	is	double,	and	for	them	is	an	honourable	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	sadqa	dene	wāle	mard	aur	sadqa	dene	wāli	aurteiñ	aur	woh	jinhoñ	ne	Allah	ko	achcha	
qarz	diya	unke	doone	haiñ	aur	unke	liye	Ízzat	ka	sawāb	hai.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصِّدِّيقُونَ ۖ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ لَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ وَنُورُهُمْ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	believe	in	Allah	and	all	His	
Noble	Messengers,	are	the	truly	sincere;	
and	are	witness	upon	others,	before	their	
Lord;	for	them	is	their	reward,	and	their	
light;	and	those	who	disbelieved	and	
denied	Our	signs,	are	the	people	of	hell.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	Allah	aur	uske	sab	Rasooloñ	
par	imān	lāayeñ	wohi	haiñ	kāmil	sachche	
aur	auroñ	par	gawah	apne	Rab	ke	yahāñ		
unke	liye	unka	sawāb	aur	unka	Noor	hai	
aur	jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiya	aur	Hamāri	
Āyateiñ	jhutlayiñ	woh	dozakhi	haiñ

arabicText: ٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌۭ وَلَهْوٌۭ وَزِينَةٌۭ وَتَفَاخُرٌۢ بَيْنَكُمْ وَتَكَاثُرٌۭ فِى ٱلْأَمْوَٰلِ وَٱلْأَوْلَـٰدِ ۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيْثٍ أَعْجَبَ ٱلْكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّۭا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَـٰمًۭا ۖ وَفِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَذَابٌۭ شَدِيدٌۭ وَمَغْفِرَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنٌۭ ۚ وَمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَآ إِلَّا مَتَـٰعُ ٱلْغُرُورِ
englishTranslationText:
Know	that	the	life	of	this	world	is	nothing	
but	play	and	pastime,	and	adornment,	and	
boasting	amongst	yourselves,	and	the	
desire	to	surpass	each	other	in	wealth	and	
children;	like	the	rain	the	produce	of	
which	pleased	the	farmer,	then	dried	so	
you	see	it	yellow,	and	then	turned	into	dry	
trampled	hay;	and	in	the	Hereafter	is	a	
severe	punishment,	and	the	forgiveness	
from	Allah	and	His	pleasure;	and	the	life	
of	this	world	is	nothing	but	counterfeit	
wealth.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jān	lo	ke	duniya	ki	zindagi	to	nahi	magar	
khel	kood	aur	āarāish	aur	tumhāra	āapas		
meiñ	badāi	mārna	aur	māl	aur	aulād	meiñ	
ek	doosre	par	ziyadati	chāhna	us	meñh	ki	
tarah	jiska	ugāya	sabza	kisānoñ	ko	bhāya	
phir	sookha	ke	tu	usey	zard	dekhe	phir	
rauñdan (pāmāl	kiya	hua)	ho	gaya	aur	
āakhirat	meiñ	sakht	‘aƶāb		hai	aur	Allah	ki	
taraf	se	bakhshish	aur	uski	raza	aur	
duniya	ka	jeena	to	nahi	magar	dhoke	ka	
māl

arabicText: سَابِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَغْفِرَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرْضُهَا كَعَرْضِ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ أُعِدَّتْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
Rush	towards	the	forgiveness	of	your	
Lord	and	a	Paradise	wide	as	the	expanse	
of	the	heavens	and	the	earth	–	made	for	
those	who	believe	in	Allah	and	all	His	
Noble	Messengers;	this	is	Allah’s	
munificence,	He	may	bestow	it	to	
whomever	He	wills;	and	Allah	is	
Extremely	Munificent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Badh	kar	chalo	apne	Rab	ki	bakhshish	aur	
us	Jannat	ki	taraf	jiski	chaudāi	jaise	āsmān	
aur	zameen	ka	phailāo	tayyār	huyi	hai	
unke	liye	jo	Allah	aur	uske	sab	Rasooloñ	
par	Imān	lāyeñ		yeh	Allah	ka	fazl	hai	jise	
chāhe	de	aur	Allah	bade	fazl	wāla	hai.

arabicText: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍۢ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن نَّبْرَأَهَآ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
There	is	no	misfortune	that	reaches	in	the	
earth	or	in	your	selves	but	is	mentioned	in	
a	Book,	before	We	initiate	it;	indeed	this	is	
easy	for	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Nahi	pahuñchti	koi	musibat	zameen	meiñ	
aur	na	tumhāri	jānoñ	meiñ	magar	woh	ek	
Kitāb	meiñ	hai	qabl	iske	ke	hum	usey	paida	kareñ	be-shak	yeh	Allah	ko	āasān	hai.

arabicText: لِّكَيْلَا تَأْسَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمْ وَلَا تَفْرَحُوا۟ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخْتَالٍۢ فَخُورٍ
englishTranslationText:
So	that	you	may	not	be	saddened	upon	losing	something,	nor	rejoice	upon	what	you	are	given;	
and	Allah	does	not	like	any	boastful,	conceited	person.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	liye	ke	gham	na	khāo	us	par	jo	hāth	se	jāye	aur	khush	na	ho	us	par	jo	tum	ko	diya	aur	Allah	ko	
nahi	bhāta	koi	itrauna	badāi	mārne	wāla

arabicText: لِّكَيْلَا تَأْسَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمْ وَلَا تَفْرَحُوا۟ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخْتَالٍۢ فَخُورٍ
englishTranslationText:
So	that	you	may	not	be	saddened	upon	losing	something,	nor	rejoice	upon	what	you	are	given;	
and	Allah	does	not	like	any	boastful,	conceited	person.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	liye	ke	gham	na	khāo	us	par	jo	hāth	se	jāye	aur	khush	na	ho	us	par	jo	tum	ko	diya	aur	Allah	ko	
nahi	bhāta	koi	itrauna	badāi	mārne	wāla

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبْخَلُونَ وَيَأْمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلْبُخْلِ ۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	practice	miserliness,	and	exhort	others	to	miserliness;	and	whoever	turns	away,	
then	(know	that)	Allah	is	the	Independent,	the	Most	Praiseworthy.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	āp	bukhl	kareñ	aur	auroñ	se	bukhl	ko	kaheiñ	aur	jo	moñh	phere	to	be-shak	Allah	hi	be
niyāz	hai	sab	khoobiyoñ	sarāha.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبْخَلُونَ وَيَأْمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلْبُخْلِ ۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	practice	miserliness,	and	exhort	others	to	miserliness;	and	whoever	turns	away,	
then	(know	that)	Allah	is	the	Independent,	the	Most	Praiseworthy.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	āp	bukhl	kareñ	aur	auroñ	se	bukhl	ko	kaheiñ	aur	jo	moñh	phere	to	be-shak	Allah	hi	be
niyāz	hai	sab	khoobiyoñ	sarāha.

arabicText: لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَأَنزَلْنَا مَعَهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ ٱلنَّاسُ بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۖ وَأَنزَلْنَا ٱلْحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأْسٌۭ شَدِيدٌۭ وَمَنَـٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥ وَرُسُلَهُۥ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	We	sent	Our	Noble	Messengers	
with	proofs,	and	sent	down	the	Book	and	
the	Balance	of	Justice	along	with	them,	so	
that	people	may	stay	upon	justice;	and	We	
sent	down	iron	having	severe	heat	and	
benefits	for	mankind,	and	so	that	Allah	
may	see	him,	who	without	seeing	aides	
Him	and	His	Noble	Messengers;	indeed	
Allah	is	Almighty,	Dominant.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		hum	ne	apne	Rasooloñ	ko	roshan	
daleelon	ke	sāth	bheja	aur	unke	sāth	kitāb	
aur	'adl	ki	tarazu	utāri	ke	log	insāf	par	
qāim	hon	aur	hum	ne	loha	utāra	is	meiñ	
sakht	ānch	aur	logoñ	ke	fāide	aur	is	liye	ke	
Allah	dekhe	usko	jo	be	dekhe	uski	aur	
uske	Rasooloñ	ki	madad	karta	hai	be-shak		
Allah	quwwat	wāla	ghalib	hai

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًۭا وَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِى ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ۖ فَمِنْهُم مُّهْتَدٍۢ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	We	sent	Nooh	and	Ibrahim,	
and	placed	Prophethood	and	the	Book	
among	their	descendants,	so	some	among	
them	took	to	guidance;	and	many	of	them	
are	sinners.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak		hum	ne	Ibraheem	aur	Nūh	ko	
bheja	aur	unki	aulād	meiñ	Nubuwwat	aur	
kitāb	rakhi	to	un	meiñ	koi	rāh	par	āaya	
aur	un	meiñ	bahutere	fāsiq	haiñ.

arabicText: ثُمَّ قَفَّيْنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِم بِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّيْنَا بِعِيسَى ٱبْنِ مَرْيَمَ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْإِنجِيلَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ رَأْفَةًۭ وَرَحْمَةًۭ وَرَهْبَانِيَّةً ٱبْتَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَبْنَـٰهَا عَلَيْهِمْ إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ رِضْوَٰنِ ٱللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوْهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَا ۖ فَـَٔاتَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ أَجْرَهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
We	then	sent	Our	other	Noble	Messengers	
after	them	following	their	footsteps,	and	
after	them	We	sent	Eisa,	the	son	of	
Maryam,	and	bestowed	the	Injeel	to	him;	
and	We	instilled	compassion	and	mercy	in	
the	hearts	of	his	followers;	and	they	
invented	monasticism	which	We	had	not	
ordained	upon	them	only	to	seek	Allah’s	
pleasure,	then	did	not	properly	abide	by	it	
as	it	should	have	been	rightfully	abided;	
We	therefore	gave	the	believers	among	
them	their	reward;	and	many	of	them	are	
sinners.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	hum	ne	unke	peechhe	usi	rāh	par	
apne	aur	Rasool	bheje	aur	unke	peechhe	
Isā	bin	Maryam	ko	bheja	aur	usey	Injeel	
‘aṭa	farmayi	aur	uske	pairawoñ	ke	dil	
meiñ	narmi	aur	Raḥmat	rakhi	aur	woh	
rāhib	banna	to	yeh	bāt	unhoñ	ne	deen	
meiñ	apni	taraf	se	nikāli	hum	ne	un	par	
muqarrar	na	ki	thi	hāñ	yeh	bid'at	unhoñ	
ne	Allah	ki	riza	chāhne	ko	paida	ki	phir	
usey	na	nibhāha	jaisa	iske	nibhāhne	ka	
haq	tha	to	unke	Imān	waloñ		ko	hum	ne	
unka	sawāb	‘aṭa	kiya	aur	un	meiñ	
bahutere	fāsiq	haiñ.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَءَامِنُوا۟ بِرَسُولِهِۦ يُؤْتِكُمْ كِفْلَيْنِ مِن رَّحْمَتِهِۦ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ نُورًۭا تَمْشُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe	(in	the	earlier	Noble	
Messengers)!	Fear	Allah	and	accept	faith	in	this	Noble	Messenger	of	His	–	He	will	bestow	two	
portions	of	His	mercy	to	you	and	will	create	a	light	for	you	to	walk	in	it,	and	will	forgive	you;	
and	Allah	is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo!	Allah	se	daro	aur	uske	Rasool	par	Imān	lāo	woh	apni	Raḥmat	ke	do	hisse	
tumheiñ		‘aṭa	farmaye	ga	aur	tumhāre	liye	Noor	kar	dega	jis	meiñ	chalo	aur	tumheiñ	bakhshish	
dega	aur	Allah	bakhshne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: لِّئَلَّا يَعْلَمَ أَهْلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَلَّا يَقْدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍۢ مِّن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَأَنَّ ٱلْفَضْلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	so	that	the	disbelievers	among	People	given	the	Book(s)	may	know	that	they	do	not	have	
any	control	over	Allah’s	munificence,	and	that	the	munificence	is	in	Allah’s	Hand	(control)	–	He	
bestows	to	whomever	He	wills;	and	Allah	is	Extremely	Munificent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	is	liye	ke	Kitāb	wāle	kāfir	jān	jāyeñ	ke	Allah	ke	fazl	par	unka	kuch	qābu	nahi	aur	yeh	ke	fazl	
Allah	ke	hāth	hai	deta	hai	jise	chāhe	aur	Allah	bade	fazl	wāla	hai.
